name: Wranglecrunk
description:
SUMMARY

The cats are loose! They're hopelessly lost and are in desperate need of saving!!! Before it runs out of battery, use your laser pointer to attract the attention of cats and lure them back to the Oasis!

CONTROLS

 Click and hold  on screen to use laser pointer

ART

Kara

Clay

CODE

Sam

Shawn

SOUND, MUSIC & VOICE OVER

Ryan
